reviews.review: Great game. admittedly, i can see why it wouldnt be for everyone, but in my experience the game just gets better and better as time goes on. sometimes good people are hard to find, but if you get lucky or get a group of friends in there are a lot of people here that are a great time to play with. 10/10
If you hate yourself you'll love this game.
Мы фулл 4 сильверы, против вас 2 глобала и 3 суприма, помогите
gran juego el mejor de todo steam!
延迟有点难受 其他的n b
polecam, fajna gierka, polubicie rosyjskie spolemecznsto na mecz mejkingach i przy okazij nauczycie sie w szybkim tempie jezyka rosyjskeigo
very good but sad with hackers
J'adore tuer les gens, et ce jeu me donne cette satisfaction sans passer par la case prison
Je to fakt sranda, pokud teda nepotkáte nadávající rusáky nebo poláky. Pokud to hrát neumíte, tak to taky tak dlouho zůstane, takže doporučuji mít kamarády, kteří jsou globálové.
Good game, it's pretty hard for a newbie, fun at times especially if you play with friends.
